title: Vibecoding & AI Automation Pathway
description: Use AI tools to generate, edit, and automate code. Learn vibecoding — framing problems and letting AI generate/execute solutions.
overview: This pathway teaches students how to use AI tools to generate, edit, and automate code. Instead of focusing on manual programming, learners explore 'vibecoding' — framing problems and letting AI generate/execute solutions. Includes exposure to Claude Code, Gemini CLI, OpenAI CLI, free tier APIs, and workflow automation with n8n.
prerequisites: Gmail account for free AI tools
learningOutcomes: Master the philosophy of vibecoding and AI-first development
Generate code effectively with AI prompting
Use Claude Code, Gemini CLI, and OpenAI CLI
Integrate AI code generation with automation pipelines

modules.title: What is Vibecoding? (Foundations)
modules.description: Understand the philosophy of vibecoding and the shift from coding by hand to orchestrating with AI.
topics: When to use AI vs manual coding

resources.title: The Future of Coding — Why AI Tools Change Everything
Cheatsheet of popular free AI coding tools (PDF)
Run 'Hello World' via Claude Code or Gemini Free
Quiz: Which AI tools allow direct code execution from CLI?
Use AI to write script that automates a boring task (e.g., renaming files)

modules.title: Prompting for Code Generation (Builder)
modules.description: Learn effective prompt strategies for AI coding assistants.

resources.title: Prompt Engineering for Code Generation
Code Prompt Templates (debugging, scaffolding, refactoring)
Use Gemini/OpenAI CLI to generate script from user story
Quiz: Which prompt best generates test cases?
Create CLI tool (AI-generated) that parses JSON and outputs report

modules.title: Using AI Coding Tools in Practice (Builder → Innovator)
modules.description: Compare coding assistants, CLIs, and IDE integrations.

resources.title: Tooling Walkthrough — Claude Code, Gemini CLI, OpenAI CLI
Tool Comparison Chart (costs, limits, free tiers)
Generate same REST API with each tool, compare
Quiz: Inline explanations vs raw code blocks
Write AI-generated blog post comparing three tools

modules.hardwareNote: Free tiers sufficient for all demos

modules.title: Workflow Automation with n8n (Innovator)
modules.description: Learn low-code/no-code automation and AI integration with n8n.

resources.title: Intro to n8n Workflows & Triggers
n8n Quick Start Guide (PDF)
Build n8n flow: prompt → AI API → email/Slack
Quiz: Trigger node vs action node in n8n
Automate workflow (e.g., summarize emails to Slack)

modules.hardwareNote: n8n runs locally with Docker or cloud free plan

modules.title: Combining AI Code Tools + Automation (Advanced Builder)
modules.description: Integrate AI code generation with automation pipelines.

resources.title: AI Agents in Workflows
Case study — Automated bugfix pipeline with AI-in-the-loop
n8n + Claude Code → auto-generate and commit to GitHub
Quiz: Why human review in AI automation?
Create end-to-end: text → code → execution pipeline

modules.title: Pathway Capstone — AI-Powered Coding System
modules.description: Build a fully automated AI coding/automation system.

resources.title: From Tools to Systems — Building the AI-First Dev Workflow
Ethical/Practical Guidelines for Automated Coding (PDF)
Demo project using n8n + AI CLI + GitHub
Quiz: Reliability, testing, and security reflection
Capstone: Choose from daily task bot, AI code factory, or SaaS prototype
